dialogs.text: Hey, you found the cookies I dropped!

choices.text: Ew, I'm not letting you eat this.
Are you the sheep with the blue shirt?

dialogs.text: Of course I'm not going to eat them... Unlike a certain pink-haired friend of mine.
No, that's the person up there. Heh heh. Sheep.
Of course, new bestie! Getting tired of listening to the bridge girl anyways. You even know what she's talking about?
